name: .5 Membership in mutual or subscriber in reciprocal insurers; no personal liability of representative
text: §431:4-106  Board of directors.  The board of directors of a domestic insurer shall consist of not less than five individuals, at least three-fourths of the individuals shall be United States citizens, and a majority of the individuals shall be residents of this State. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
